cells.data:
LineageOS
Basic: https://download.lineageos.org/FP3

Generall installation guide
https://forum.fairphone.com/t/fp3-fp3-complete-guide-for-installing-lineageos/69239

De-googled w/ microG:
https://lineage.microg.org/
Installation documentation: https://wiki.lineageos.org/devices/FP3/install

or (less stable IMHO):
https://doc.e.foundation/easy-installer
https://doc.e.foundation/devices/FP3/

Troubleshooting: LineageOS not booting
  1. Shutdown/Remove battery
  2. Volume Down+ Power  (Seen frontally from the side, display up: >>>[Volume -]<<< -  [Volume +] - [Power]) => starts recovery mode (here: LineageOS)
  3. Advanced: ADB on
  4. Advanced: mount /system/
  5. On ADB computer:

adb root
adb shell
# do stuff e.g. remove data/system/locations.db
